name: Loopy Train
description:
***Entry for Ludum Dare 47*** | Made by Otis Laundon and William Bernas

In Loopy Train, you manage a train and ensure the safety of your passengers. Build carriages, turrets and upgrade your engine to safely transport your passengers through hordes of enemies. The more passenger your train can have, the more money you make. What are you waiting for ?–go and make a stupidly long train!
